definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Only those who have read his general collection can understand his literary path.
sentences.chinese: 看过他总集的人，才会了解他的文学创作之路。

sentences.english: The Book of Songs is the earliest collection of poems and songs in China.
sentences.chinese: 诗经是中国历史上第一部诗歌总集。

sentences.english: Mozi is the collection of Moist writings of the Warring States Period.
sentences.chinese: 《墨子》是战国时期墨家著作的总集。

sentences.english: Tom: Absolutely, The Book of Songs is one of the earliest anthologies of verse in china.
sentences.chinese: 没错，《诗经》是最早的一部诗歌总集。

sentences.english: Wenxuan selected by Xiao Tong is the earliest existing set of poems.
sentences.chinese: 萧统《文选》是我国现存最早的一部诗文总集。

sentences.english: The Collection of Huajian School is the first collection of literati's Ci-poetry.
sentences.chinese: 《花间集》是我国词史上第一部文人词总集。

sentences.english: This article deals with certain aspects of the Complete Works of Opera of the Yuan Dynasty compiled by Prof.
sentences.chinese: 《全元戏曲》是由王季思先生主编的元代戏曲总集。

definition: Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads, compiled in the 11th century by Guo Maoqian 郭茂倩[Guo1 Mao4 qian4]
Guo Maoqian (11th century), Song dynasty editor of the Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads 樂府詩集|乐府诗集[Yue4 fu3 Shi1 ji2]

Finest Blossoms in the Garden of Literature, Song dynasty collection of poetry, odes, songs and writings compiled during 982-986 under Li Fang 李昉[Li3 Fang3], Xu Xuan 徐鉉|徐铉[Xu2 Xuan4], Song Bai 宋白[Song4 Bai2] and Su Yijian 蘇易簡|苏易简[Su1 Yi4 jian3], 1000 scrolls

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
Tripitaka Koreana, Buddhist scriptures carved on 81,340 wooden tablets and housed in Haeinsa 海印寺[Hai3 yin4 si4] in South Gyeongsang province of South Korea
to record/to put down in writing
Avatamsaka sutra of the Huayan school/also called Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra, the Flower adornment sutra or the Garland sutra
